item.title: AMC Lincoln Square Closed Due to Flooding From Intense New York City Storm
item.description: One of AMC’s most popular Manhattan locations is temporarily closed after heavy rains in the city caused flooding in its Lincoln Square theater. A spokesperson for the theater chain said the dow

item.title: Eminem Documentary ‘Stans’ Books Limited August Run in AMC Theatres
item.description: Director Steven Leckart uses the film, which will stream on Paramount+, to explore fandom at its best and worst.

item.title: AMC Theatres Gets Stock Upgrade on Outlook of “More Consistent” Blockbuster Releases
item.description: Stock in the mega-exhibitor soared on Friday as a Wedbush analyst argued glaring uncertainties brought on by the pandemic and the Hollywood strikes is behind the debt-laden company.
